title: 84/236/EEC: Commission Decision of 4 April 1984 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Perkin- Elmer - Scanning Auger Microprobe PHI, model 590A' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 4 April 1984
establishing that the apparatus described as 'Perkin-Elmer - Scanning Auger Microprobe PHI, model 590A' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(84/236/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'Perkin-Elmer - Scanning Auger Microprobe PHI, model 590A', which is the subject of an application by the Federal Republic of Germany of 20 September 1983, may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 April 1984.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 74, 18. 3. 1982, p. 4.
(3) OJ No L 318, 13. 12. 1979, p. 32.
